name: Recipe: Mondstadt Grilled Fish
desc: A detailed step-by-step recipe for making Mondstadt Grilled Fish.

value.name: Fish
value.desc: A fresh fillet of fish. Handled properly, it can make a rich dish.

value.name: Pepper
value.desc: Peppery. Cuts through oily flavors and excites the taste buds. Goes best on meat.

value.name: Mondstadt Grilled Fish
value.desc: Fish grilled thoroughly with moderate fire, making it completely dry and crispy. The sprinkled pepper on top brings out the freshness of the fish.

value.name: Diona
value.desc: A young lady who has inherited trace amounts of non-human blood. She is the incredibly popular bartender of the Cat's Tail tavern.

value.name: Definitely Not Bar Food!
value.desc: Diona's specialty. The fish skin is crisp, and the meat is sumptuous. Only someone with a sufficiently great love for fish would be able to bring out such lovely flavors. Now, if only there were something to drink to go with it... Uh-oh, she's looking this way!

value.text: <color=#ffffffd9>Available at the start of the game</color>
